game.name: Fantasy World Manager
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 창작마당, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Create your own massive-scale, living fantasy world. Design every creature, hero, object, quest, and event. Build cultures, religions, and factions, and construct entire overworlds, interiors, and dungeons that bring your world to life through wars, stories, and endless possibilities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create your own massive-scale, living fantasy world. Design every creature, hero, object, quest, and event. Build cultures, religions, and factions, and construct entire overworlds, interiors, and dungeons that bring your world to life through wars, stories, and endless possibilities.
